CustomField.formula: IF(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SEG_Cliente', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SEG_Seguimiento'), IF(TEXT(Priority) = 'Low',IMAGE("/resource/CC_Green",'Verde',15,15), IF(TEXT(Priority) = 'Medium',IMAGE("/resource/CC_Orange",'Naranja',15,15), IF(OR(TEXT(Priority) = 'Critical',TEXT(Priority) = 'High'),IMAGE("/resource/CC_Red",'Rojo',15,15),null))), null)
CustomField.label: Prioridad
